description:
The girls decides to go visit Noa-chan when they hear she’s sick.
When they ring the doorbell, they’re greeted by Ami-chan, Noa-chan’s little sister.
Minami-chan is surprised how different she is from Noa-chan.
Fuyumi-chan runs to Noa-chan’s room, worried sick. 
There, the girls see a giant chocolate cornet..,?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 風邪ひき! のあちゃん
